text: @narendramodi That's not what i said , it is just a what if theory . ..... What if the asteroid that had to pass by Earth on April actually hit Earth , and Covid-19 was sent by god to make us stay with our family during this last few days . #21daysLockdown  #Asteroid2020  #Covid19India
